decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (4065-20 Rev 01, 4065-81 Rev 01, 4065-10 Rev 01 and 4065-80 Rev 01 received on 15/02/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The office floor space contained within the Vehicle Maintenance Unit hereby approved shall be used only as offices ancillary to the main use of the whole building as B1(c), B2 or B8 class use and shall not be used for any other purpose.
description: Alterations to existing Vehicle Maintenance Unit building to provide first floor mezzanine office and three replacement level access vehicle doors to the rear elevation with increased width to allow for improved vehicular access
